original_text: Brethren, I count not myself to have apprehended: but this one thing I do, forgetting those things which are behind, and reaching forth unto those things which are before,
korean_text: 형제들아 나는 아직 내가 잡은 줄로 여기지 아니하고 오직 한 일 즉 뒤에 있는 것은 잊어버리고 앞에 있는 것을 잡으려고

sentences.original_text: Brethren, I count not myself to have apprehended:
sentences.korean_translation: 형제들아, 내가 이미 잡았다고 생각하지 아니하노라

sentences.original_text: but this one thing I do,
forgetting those things which are behind,
and reaching forth unto those things which are before,
